<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_package</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Set subscription enforcement on update</name> <order>200</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var licensable = current.getValue('licensable'); var trackable = current.getValue('trackable'); var enforcementLevel = current.getValue('enforce_license'); //gs.log('For package ' + current.source + ' in set enforcement update BR, licensable = <' + licensable + '>, trackable = <' + trackable + '>, enforcement = ' + enforcementLevel, 'Set app enforcement on update'); if (licensable == '1' || trackable == '1') {
if (enforcementLevel == '' || enforcementLevel == 'none') {
// cannot set to None for trackable apps, can happen from a list current.setValue('enforce_license', previous.getValue('enforce_license'));
gs.log('For package ' + current.source + ' set enforcement to previous value ' + previous.getValue('enforce_license') , 'Set app enforcement on update');
}
} else if (licensable == '0' && trackable == '0') {
current.setValue('enforce_license',' none'); gs.log('For package ' + current.source + ' set enforcement to none' , 'Set app enforcement on update'); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-11-06 18:06:38</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>36b6433537a30200b5b86e17be41f131</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>30</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set subscription enforcement on update</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Subscription Management and Enforcement Framework" source="com.glide.subscription_framework">8e3430a83c31311068bcf327dfe37fe5</sys_package> <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_36b6433537a30200b5b86e17be41f131</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-12-03 11:58:52</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=36b6433537a30200b5b86e17be41f131"/> </record_update>
